metadata.synopsis: Elwyn has stopped chanting as the druids prepare to battle the tieflings in a fight to the death. She regrets that this has to happen, but will do what needs to be done.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game 2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe startdruidattack4. oe druidattackkilldruids5. goto 235.409; 14.982; 504.5956, Talk with Elwyn

0.speaker: Elwyn
0.text: I'm sorry. But this must be done.
0.context: NodeContext: The druids are preparing to attack the tieflings in the grove - and the player.
